items.summary: Add the uploaded image "cruise-290913_1280.jpg" to the deployed frontend static assets as the homepage hero image file at the exact public path "/assets/generated/cruise-ship-hero.dim_1600x900.jpg" (1600x900).

Ensure the homepage hero section uses the hero image from "/assets/generated/cruise-ship-hero.dim_1600x900.jpg" and displays it as a full-screen background with a sensible cover/fill behavior across common viewport sizes.

Keep (or add if missing) the current resilient fallback behavior for the homepage hero: if the hero image fails to load, the gradient background remains visible and a small readable error message is shown without breaking layout.
Ensure the HTML preload link (if present) matches the hero image path exactly so the browser preloads the correct asset: "/assets/generated/cruise-ship-hero.dim_1600x900.jpg".
